content: add a splash of color to your neutral palette with this lively crochet blanket stitched in caron anniversary cakes vibrant colors reveal themselves as you work so you don t have to switch yarns practice corner-to-corner double_crochet chain stitch and more as the yarn reveals a stunning color effect finished with playful fringe that extends the shades this throw brings energy and flair to a room materials caron® anniversary cakes™ 35 3 oz/1000 g 1061 yds/970 m peach bellini 47080 2 balls or 1500 yds/ 1372 m measurement approx 50 127 cm square excluding fringe
